Add AA_change column and convert protein position to numeric

Source: R/heatmap.R
add_aa_change.Rd

Internal helper function that creates the AA_change identifier (e.g., "A123V") from amino acid and position columns, converts position to numeric, and filters out rows with invalid positions.

Usage

add_aa_change(data, amino_acids_col, position_col)

Arguments

data

A data frame containing variant information.

amino_acids_col

Character. Name of the amino acids column.

position_col

Character. Name of the protein position column.

Value

A data frame with AA_change column added, Protein_position as numeric, and rows with NA positions removed.

On this page
